controllers

Class AlbumsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.AlbumsController

  • public class AlbumsController
extends java.lang.Object
    The AlbumsController class handles all the interactions the user has with their saved albums.
    Author:
    Evan Loriot, Joseph Klaszky

      Checks to see if there is already an album with the same name that was just entered by the user.

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage mainStage)
        Called when the user enters the albums view. Handles all user interactions when adding/editing albums.
        Parameters:
        mainStage - current application stage

      • doesAlbumExist

        public boolean doesAlbumExist(java.lang.String name)
        Checks to see if there is already an album with the same name that was just entered by the user.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the album that the user wants to add.
        Returns:
        boolean -- True if the album already exists, false otherwise.

      • addAlbum

        public void addAlbum(java.lang.String name)
        Attempts to add a new album.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the album to be added.

      • renameAlbum

        public void renameAlbum(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String newName)
        Renames a user selected album.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the current album.
        newName - New name for the current album.

      • deleteAlbum

        public void deleteAlbum(java.lang.String name)
        Looks for and deletes a user selected album.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the album the user would like to delete.

      • getAlbums

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Album>> getAlbums()
        Gets all of the users albums
        Returns:
        A list of lists -- Gets the list users albums.

      • resizeAlbums

        public void resizeAlbums()
        Changes the size of the displayed albums when new items are added or deleted.
